this is my gradle.properties file for my project, and i don't have gradle.properties file at the system level # Project-wide Gradle settings. # IDE (e.g. Android Studio) users: # Gradle settings configured through the IDE *will override* # any settings specified in this file. # For more details on how to configure your build environment visit # http://www.gradle.org/docs/current/userguide/build_environment.html # Specifies the JVM arguments used for the daemon process. # The setting is particularly useful for tweaking memory settings. # Default value: -Xmx10248m -XX:MaxPermSize=256m #org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx2048m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 org.gradle.jvmargs=-Xmx8704m -XX:+HeapDumpOnOutOfMemoryError -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 # When configured, Gradle will run in incubating parallel enabled. # This option should only be used with decoupled projects. More details, visit # http://www.gradle.org/docs/current/userguide/multi_project_builds.html#sec:decoupled_projects org.gradle.parallel=true org.gradle.daemon=true org.gradle.configureondemand=false org.gradle.caching=true secure.properties=../secure.properties android.useAndroidX=true android.enableJetifier=true kotlin.incremental=true
i see you have jvm property https.proxyHost set to 127.0.0.1. This may lead to incorrect behaviour.

I'm getting the following error while building my project. The error is: Connect to 127.0.0.1:9090 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused ``` Execution failed for task ':rudder_plugin_android:compileDebugJavaWithJavac'. > Could not resolve all files for configuration ':rudder_plugin_android:debugCompileClasspath'. > Could not resolve com.rudderstack.android.sdk:core:[1.24.0, 2.0.0). Required by: project :rudder_plugin_android > Failed to list versions for com.rudderstack.android.sdk:core. > Unable to load Maven meta-data from https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/com/rudderstack/android/sdk/core/maven-metadata.xml. > Could not HEAD 'https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/com/rudderstack/android/sdk/core/maven-metadata.xml'. > Got socket exception during request. It might be caused by SSL misconfiguration > Connect to 127.0.0.1:9090 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused ... Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused at java.base/sun.nio.ch.Net.pollConnect(Native Method) at java.base/sun.nio.ch.Net.pollConnectNow(Unknown Source) at java.base/sun.nio.ch.NioSocketImpl.timedFinishConnect(Unknown Source) at java.base/sun.nio.ch.NioSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) ``` How do I fix this?
